UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The Central Hinge Link Truncation of the Antimicrobial Peptide Fowlicidin-3 Enhances Its Cell Selectivity without Antibacterial Activity Loss.
Literature.Author: Qu P, Gao W, Chen H, Li D, Yang N, Zhu J, Feng X, Liu C, Li Z

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:<5% Hemolysis=256 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:<40% Killing=256 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=4µM),Salmonella typhimurium ATCC 7731(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=4µM),Bacillus subtilis CMCC 63501(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=2µM)
